summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of ER-EMR application. Backend APIs working at 100% success rate after minor bug fix. Frontend functionality working well with successful user journey from login to case creation to AI features.

resolved_issues.issue: AttributeError when case disposition was None
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added null check for disposition field in AI prompt generation

integration_issues.issue: Newly created case not immediately visible in dashboard case list
integration_issues.workaround: Page refresh shows the case correctly

passed_tests: Dashboard statistics display (Total: 1, Draft: 0, Completed: 1, Discharged: 0)
Case creation with patient information and vitals
ABCDE primary assessment form navigation and data entry
Form tab navigation (Patient Info, Vitals, ABCDE, History, Examination, Investigations, Treatment)
Frontend user journey from login to case creation
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue: Case list refresh timing - newly created cases may not appear immediately in dashboard list. Consider adding real-time updates or manual refresh mechanism.
